text: Brees is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Drew Brees (born 1979), American football player *Herbert J. Brees (1877–1958), American lieutenant general *Orlo M. Brees (1896–1980), American newspaper editor, author, and politician *Samuel Brees (c.1810–1865), New Zealand artist, surveyor and engineer
title: Brees (surname)
